item.title: Raichur: Fight between two groups over trivial issue in Manvi; one killed, more than 10 injured
item.description:
<![CDATA[Activist Snehamayi Krishna moves HC seeking CBI probe into MUDA scam 04-03-2025 ¦ 04-03-2025 IST
04-03-2025 ¦ 04-03-2025 IST
Activist Snehamayi Krishna | PC: FB
Bengaluru, Mar 4 (PTI): Activist Snehamayi Krishna on Tuesday moved the Karnataka High Court challenging the single judge order refusing a CBI investigation against Chief Minister Siddaramaiah in the MUDA site allotment scam.
In his fresh petition, he appealed to the court to set aside the February 7 order passed by Justice M Nagap...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi
